version_description: We had some trebble with the songbooks. Now it's from the past.
Wow - Such score! Much controls. Amaze. Do update!

- Pianist, discover our brand new Piano Chords!
- New design for easier navigation
Print is back! You can also try our brand new learning mode! Stay tuned, a lot more is to come!
Bug fix
bug fix
Yearly subscription is back!
Bug fix
Bug fix

New on Jellynote:
- Complete redesign of the App
- Introducing Social chat to meet with other musicians on Jellynote
- New Score view
- New Game Mode
- Original videos with artists and teachers

• facebook and google connect fix
• optimisations

- multiple track selection
- vertical scrolling option
- iPad optimisations
- bug fix
Just a tiny little bug fix before the end of the year.

Fixes:
Freemium timer in background
Vertical scroll and portrait view for scores
iPad design improvement
Stability improvement
You can now be Premium for a day! Quite a big update on the Social part too! Go take a look! And bug fix, bug fix is important.
Universal Linking and a little bug fixed
Jellynote Social is now even better! Search for old friends, find new friends and get together.
Jellynote Social keeps getting better and better. Message notifications and shortcuts mean you can get socialising more readily!
Jellynote keeps getting better and better. Download to see all of our new improvements and fixes.
Jellynote keeps getting better and better! Checkout the latest version with enhanced social features.
The latest version from Jellynote features offline playlists and a tuner so you can be perfectly tuned and ready to play wherever you are.
Fixing a few bugs
Jellynote has a new sleeker design and now features a step by step guide for beginner guitarists to get you playing your favourite songs more readily.
Fixing a few bugs
We removed unused analytic libraries and updated some dependencies.

v3.1.0:

- The app now automatically logs you in
- New languages available: Portuguese, Spanish and Russian in addition to English and French
- We also added a selection of free sheet music for the piano, guitar, violin, drums, trumpet, clarinet and flute
- Various bug fixes

From v3.0:

We have rebuilt the app from the ground up: it has everything you liked and we got rid of all the bugs and the inconsistencies. For those of you who have been using our website, you will find a similar experience here: ever growing catalog of songs, all the scores you have saved or purchased in My Scores and the interactive learning tools to help you master a song. We are keen to hear your feedback, email us at support@jellynote.com to tell us about your experience!
